common.findBugOrNeedHelp: Find a bug or need help? Email collective{'@'}lockdown.systems.
common.withCydDescriptionRest: you can automatically delete your data in tech platforms, except for what you want to keep.
common.readyToGetStarted: Ready to get started? Add a new account.
common.unknownAccountType: Unknown account type. Something is wrong.

progress.updatingBanner: Updating the banner on your X profile
progress.updatingBio: Updating your bio on your X profile
progress.rateLimitHit: You have hit a rate limit!

error.failedToGetDeviceInfo: Failed to get saved device info.

updates.shouldUseLatestVersion: You should always use the latest version of Cyd.
updates.installViaPackageManager: Install updates using your operating system's package manager.
updates.errorWithAutomaticUpdate: Error with automatic update. Install the latest version of Cyd
updates.updateAvailableMessage: You are running Cyd {currentVersion}. Cyd {latestVersion} is the latest version, and you should upgrade.
updates.noUpdatesAvailableMessage: You are running Cyd {currentVersion}, which is the latest version.

signIn.title: Sign in to Cyd to access premium features
signIn.openSourceMode: You're using Cyd in open source developer mode, which does not use a server.
signIn.supportProject: If you're not contributing to Cyd, please support the project by paying for a Premium plan.
signIn.subscribeLabel: Opt-in to occasional email updates from the Lockdown Systems collective, the developers of Cyd
signIn.emailPrivacy: Your email address will be used to identify your account. We won't share it or send you unsolicited emails.
signIn.verificationCodeSent: We've emailed you a verification code. Enter it below.

error.signInRestricted: At the moment, sign-ins are restricted to specific people. Sorry!
error.failedToGetDeviceInfo: Failed to get device info. Please try again later.
error.failedToRegisterDevice: Failed to register device. Please try again later.
error.failedToRegisterNewDevice: Failed to register new device. Please try again later.

errorReport.title: Submit an error report
errorReport.sendExtraDetailsDescription: This includes your username, a screenshot of the embedded browser, and other data that could help debug this problem.
errorReport.moreInfoHelpful: The more info you provide, the easier it will be for us to fix.
errorReport.retryQuestion: Do you want to try this step again, or cancel and go back to the dashboard?

error.noDetails: Well this is awkward. I don't seem to have details about your error report. This shouldn't happen.
error.submissionError: Well this is awkward. There's an error submitting your automation error report.

import.lastImportedArchive: You last imported your X archive {timeAgo}.
import.lastBuiltDatabase: You last built your local database from scratch {timeAgo}.
import.needImportForMigration: You'll need to import your local database of tweets before you can migrate them to Bluesky.
import.needImportOrBuild: You'll need to import your local database of tweets, or build it from scratch, before you can delete your tweets or likes, or migrate your tweets to Bluesky.
import.beforeImportSteps: Before you can import your X archive, you need to download it by following these steps:
import.mightNeedToSignIn: You might need to sign in to X first.
import.proveIdentityDescription: You'll probably need to type your X password. You might also need to get a verification code sent to your email, or do other things to verify your identity.
import.waitForArchive: After requesting your archive, you'll need to wait at least a day, and maybe longer. Sorry!
import.downloadZipFile: When it's ready, download the ZIP file from X.
import.afterFollowingSteps: After you've followed these steps and you have your archive ZIP file, click the button below.

upsell.thanksForPremium: Thanks for using a Premium plan.
upsell.ifYouLikeToSupport: If you'd like to support us even more, {donation}
upsell.premiumForTeamsQuestion: Would Cyd would be useful for your team? Check out
upsell.andIfYouLikeToSupport: And if you'd like to support us even more,
upsell.waysToSupport: Here are ways to support us:
upsell.premiumDescription: Unlock features like deleting DMs and migrating tweets to Bluesky
upsell.teamsDescription: Get Cyd Premium for everyone at your organization or company
upsell.donateDescription: Show your support by making a donation!

dashboard.localDatabaseDescription: Make or update your local backup of X data. Cyd references this data when you delete from X or migrate to Bluesky.
dashboard.deleteFromXDescription: Delete your tweets, retweets, likes, bookmarks, or DMs from your X account, or unfollow everyone.
dashboard.importXArchiveDescription: Import data from an X archive file to create a backup without logging to X.
dashboard.migrateToBlueskyDescription: Migrate your tweets from your X account to a Bluesky account.
dashboard.tombstoneDescription: Update your X profile to make it clear that you've moved on to better social media sites.

wizard.timeToMoveOn: It's time to move on from X. How can I help you?
wizard.bannerDescription: Customize the background, show Bluesky or Mastodon icons, and include text about how you escaped.
wizard.bioDescription: Make sure your new bio text tells your followers that you are leaving X, and where to find you now.
wizard.bioTooLong: Your bio is {count} characters too long
wizard.updateMyBannerAndLock: Update My Banner and Lock My Account
wizard.updateMyBioAndLock: Update My Bio and Lock My Account
wizard.updateMyBannerAndBioAndLock: Update My Banner and Bio, and Lock My Account
wizard.selectCheckboxToContinue: Select a Checkbox Above to Continue
wizard.iveDownloadedMyArchive: I've Downloaded My Archive from X
wizard.deleteFromXDescription: Delete your data from X, except for what you want to keep.
wizard.buildOptionsDescription: You can save tweets, likes, and direct messages.
wizard.archiveOptionsDescription: You can save an HTML version of each tweet, and you can save your bookmarks and your direct messages.
wizard.buildYourLocalDatabaseDescription: There are different ways to get data from your X account. How would you like to proceed?
wizard.importXArchiveRecommendedDescription: You have a lot of data so importing your X archive is definitely the way to go.
wizard.buildFromScratchDescription: X restricts how much of your data you can access. You likely won't get all of your data if you have Cyd build it from scratch. Building from scratch is a great way to backup your direct messages, though.
wizard.unlessTheyHaveAtLeastRetweets: unless they have at least {count} retweets
wizard.unlessTheyHaveAtLeastLikes: unless they have at least {count} likes
wizard.unlessTheyHaveAtLeastRetweetsOrLikes: unless they have at least {retweets} retweets or {likes} likes
wizard.saveHTMLVersionOfEachTweet: Save an HTML version of each tweet
wizard.saveHTMLVersionDescription: Make an HTML archive of each tweet, including its replies, which is good for taking screenshots
wizard.takesMuchLonger: (takes much longer than just deleting them)
wizard.migrateToBlueskyDescription: Import your old tweets into a Bluesky account. You may want to make a new Bluesky account just for your old tweets.
wizard.recommendReimport: We recommend that you reimport your local database of tweets, or rebuild it from scratch, {em} migrating to Bluesky.
wizard.recommendReimportReason: When you last built your local database of tweets, Cyd didn't keep track of things like media, replies, and quote tweets. If you migrate to Bluesky now, you may lose some of your data.
wizard.connectBlueskyAccount: To get started, connect your Bluesky account.
wizard.finishConnectingInBrowser: Finish connecting to the Bluesky account {strong} in your web browser.
wizard.connectedToBlueskyAccount: You have connected to the following Bluesky account:
wizard.noTweetsToDelete: You don't have any tweets to delete.
wizard.confirmDeleteMigratedTweets: Are you sure you want to delete all migrated tweets from Bluesky?

archiveOnly.title: Import X Archive
archiveOnly.description: Can't access your X account? No problem! You can still migrate your tweets to Bluesky using an archive file that you previously downloaded from X.
archiveOnly.xArchiveFileDescription: A copy of your X archive that you downloaded earlier
archiveOnly.cantDeleteDataDescription: Cyd can't delete data from your account if you're not logged in
archiveOnly.cantSaveExtraDataDescription: Cyd can't save extra data from your account, like HTML versions of your tweets

wizard.databaseNoTweetsWarning: Your local database doesn't have any tweets yet. You need to import your X archive or build your database from scratch before you can save HTML versions of your tweets.
wizard.tweetsNotArchivedYet: You have {strong} that haven't been archived yet
wizard.likesDescription: Likes are only visible to you on X. Cyd will delete all of the likes it can, but it can't delete ghost likes.
wizard.bookmarksDescription: Bookmarks are only visible to you on X.
wizard.dmsDescription: This will only delete DMs from your account. The people you've sent messages to will still have them unless they delete their DMs as well.
wizard.saveHTMLTweetsDMsBookmarks: Save HTML tweets, direct messages, and/or bookmarks
wizard.saveHTMLTweetsDMsBookmarksDescription: Cyd can save an HTML version of each tweet, and detailed backup of your direct messages, and your bookmarks.
wizard.buildFromScratchRecommended: You don't have a lot of data in your X account, so having Cyd scroll through your profile will be faster. Building from scratch is also a great way to backup your direct messages.
wizard.importArchiveDescription: Importing your X archive will work great, but you'll need to wait at least a day for X to send it to you if you don't already have it.
wizard.importArchiveUnknown: Importing your X archive is probably the best option, but you'll need to wait at least a day for X to send it to you if you don't already have it.
wizard.lockAccountEnableProtect: Enable the "Protect your posts" feature, so only your followers can see your posts.

platform.u2fNotice: If you use a U2F security key (like a Yubikey) for 2FA, press it when you see a white screen.
platform.importArchiveOnly: Import Archive Only (for deleted accounts with an archive)

finished.submitErrorReportMessage: Please submit an error report so we can fix the problems you encountered.
finished.failedToScrollTweetsAndLikes: Cyd wasn't able to scroll through all of your tweets and likes this time.
finished.failedToScrollTweets: Cyd wasn't able to scroll through all of your tweets this time.
finished.failedToScrollLikes: Cyd wasn't able to scroll through all of your likes this time.
finished.runAgainMessage: Run Cyd again with the same settings to try again from the beginning.
finished.noBlueskyProfile: Something is wrong. No Bluesky profile found for this account.

premium.featuresRequirePremium: The following features require a Premium account:
premium.manageAccountToUpgrade: Manage your account to upgrade to Premium.
premium.readyToDelete: Ready to delete your data from X?
premium.readyToMigrate: Ready to migrate your tweets into Bluesky?
premium.haventUpgraded: You haven't upgraded to Premium yet. Please try again.
premium.deleteTweetsOlderThan: Delete tweets older than a set number of days
premium.deleteTweetsUnlessRetweets: Delete tweets unless they have at least a certain number of retweets
premium.deleteTweetsUnlessLikes: Delete tweets unless they have at least a certain number of likes
premium.deleteRetweetsOlderThan: Delete retweets older than a set number of days
premium.signInToGetStarted: To get started, sign in to your Cyd account.

account.xDescription: Formerly Twitter, owned by billionaire Elon Musk
account.facebookDescription: A subsidiary of Meta, owned by billionaire Mark Zuckerberg
account.blueskyDescription: Open source social media platform based on AT Protocol

review.backToMigrateOptions: Back to Migrate to Bluesky Options
review.unlessTheyHaveAtLeastOr: unless they have at least {retweets} retweets or {likes} likes
review.haventSavedHTML: You haven't saved HTML versions of any of these tweets.
review.haventSavedHTMLSome: You haven't saved HTML versions of {count} of these tweets.
review.beforeDeleteThem: before you delete them. Otherwise, just delete them.

importing.browseForArchive: Browse for the ZIP file of the X archive you downloaded, or the folder where you have already extracted it.
importing.cydCanBackupMore: Cyd can backup even more data from your X account that isn't included in your archive. If you don't care about this, you're ready to delete or migrate your data now.
importing.readyToMigrate: You're ready to migrate your data now.
importing.failedToGetAccountDataPath: Failed to get account data path for archive-only account

facebook.deleteFromFacebookDescription: Delete your data from Facebook, except for what you want to keep.
facebook.backToImportOrBuild: Back to Import or Build Database
facebook.unknownReviewType: Oops, this is awkward. You clicked back, but I'm not sure where to go.
facebook.saveHTMLVersionOfEachPost: Save an HTML version of each post
facebook.saveHTMLVersionOfEachPostDescription: Make an HTML archive of each post, including its comments, which is good for taking screenshots
facebook.cydCanUnfriendEveryone: Cyd can unfriend everyone right away
facebook.needImportOrBuildToDelete: You'll need to import or build your database to delete your Facebook posts

tabs.cannotSignOutWithoutDeviceInfo: Cannot sign out without device info
tabs.removeAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this account from Cyd?
tabs.signOutOfAccount: Sign out of my Cyd account
tabs.signInToAccessPremium: Sign in to Cyd to access premium features

alertStayAwake.title: Your computer needs to be awake to use Cyd.
alertStayAwake.description: Don't close the lid, keep it plugged in, and disable sleep while plugged in.

migrateBluesky.noTweetsToMigrate: You don't have any tweets to migrate.
migrateBluesky.youCanMigrate: You can migrate {count} tweets into Bluesky.
